CustomField.description: This setting allows you to specify the number of times a user can retake a quiz in order to pass it. For example, if you set the number of retakes allowed to 3, a user will have up to 3 attempts to pass the quiz.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determine the maximum number of quiz retakes allowed to pass the quiz. This setting controls the number of times a quiz taker can retake the quiz if they fail to achieve a passing score within their initial attempt. Once the retake limit is reached, further retakes will be restricted for the participant.
CustomField.label: Quiz Retake Limit
